snippet.title: Bloodlines 2 - Insane Abilities You Want To Unlock EARLY
snippet.description:
Sink your teeth into the best clan abilities in Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines 2. In this video, Codiak breaks down the most powerful offensive and utility skills across the Brujah, Tremere, Ventrue, and Toreador clans — from devastating powers like Earthshock and Blood Salvo to game-changing abilities like Blink, Possession, and Cauldron of Blood. Learn how to master your vampire abilities, optimize your build, and dominate the streets of Seattle with precision and style.

0:00 Intro
0:45 Earthshock
1:46 Blood Salvo
2:40 Terminal Decree
3:22 Blood Curse
4:32 Blink
5:45 Possession
6:44 Cauldron of Blood
7:32 Beckon & Taunt
8:25 Subscribe For More Bloodlines 2
